channel.title: Ekstrak - "Short" Patience [Haloween, Drum and Bass]

There's an extended mix of this song that I decided not to upload on Soundcloud. If anyone wants to hear a longer mix of this track, let me know and I'll decide.

A Halloween-Themed Minimal DnB track. I do hope you all enjoy it! Feedback and Constructive Criticism is allowed!
